Horace Goes To The Tower

by Mojon Twins

Released Aug 1, 2011
Players 1
License Unknown

Download ROM

Description

The game is simple: jump and run, find keys to fit in keyholes and open your path to unaccesible areas, and get all the master tapes (10 in total) spread accross the whole tower. In many screens, in order to be able to advance, you'll have to push special blocks (checkered and green) to move them to most adecuate places so you can jump on them and reach higher platforms you wouldn't otherwise reach. If you get trapped, thanks to the miracles of modern science, you can press R so everything gets back to its original place (you included).
